column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We ordered for starters the calamari
column4: and a bottle of red wine. The calamari and the caesar salad were fantastic. We could have done without the cheese bread. We ordered 3 medium pizzas. The Lou
column6: and The Sausage thin crust pizza. Hands down
column7: The Thin Crust Sausage Pizza was the top favorite for our table of 5 people. The 2nd choice was The Malnati Chicago Classic. The Lou
column8: we could have done without. The crust is amazing good. So buttery and it just melts in your mouth good. The pizzas are very filling
column9: so we ended up taking 1 1/2 pizza's home.
